clinical_study.brief_title: Using Tailored Emails to Motivate Healthy Behavior Among Employees
clinical_study.official_title: Using Tailored Emails to Motivate Healthy Behavior, Improve Health Status, & Reduce Health Care Costs in Employee Populations: A Randomized Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this research is to evaluate the efficacy of a multi-component email health promotion program on employee adoption of health promoting behaviors and secondarily on health status, work productivity and health care costs.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult employee of participating worksite
- Access to desktop computer
Exclusion Criteria:
- Under 18 years of age
